div.p:
Curia gilde tenta per prepositum in pretorio huius burgi xxj die mensis marcij
Anno Domini et cetera xliijo

Quo die penes quendam forisstalatorem'atorem' overwrites 'ar'. vocatem
prosecutum per Johannem de spens seriendum / et remotum per vt asseritur per thomam de
stane concilium decreuit et ordinauit quod idem thomas Jurabit quod non remouit eum nec impediuit
dictum seriendum ad capiendum eiusdem / in fraudem legum vel statutorum huius
burgi / vel quod intrabit dictum foristallatorem ad calumpniam prepositj et cetera

Item penes actionem motam super firma quarte partis terrarum de Schethokisley
idem consilium decreuit quod Johannes de scrogs filius qui dictam quartam partem
alijs forensibus assedauit / satisfaciet vel satisfieri faciet de firma
eiusdem / et si necesse fuerit pro eo eadem distringetur et cetera
Item penes assedacionem

It is ordanit and statute be the commoune Counsaile of this burgh' for the gude and
availe of merchandice / that naman by woll derrar' than v s' the stane / and
quhasa dois bijs derar' sal pay to the commoune profite of this burgh' xl s'
vnforgiffin for ilke tyme that he trespass agaynis statute

Antepenultimo die mensis maij Anno supradicto de consensu communis Consilij assecuratj
fuerunt et licenciatj Hartilpule in anglia et naute sui cum
naue de Hartilpule in angliam ad veniendum infra portum huius burgi et
Remanendum et ad partes suas ad placitum suum Recedendum libere et sine quouis
obstaculo

Quarto die mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera xliiijto per Commune Consilium ordinatum fuit
et statutum et cetera

In the firste that naman fleschehowar' within' the burgh' or withoute / sell mutoune
derrar' than the bouke for ij s' viij the best that may be gottin / and the remanant
thar' eftir be the price vndir the payne of viij s' vnforgivin als oft as thai trespass'

Item that na fleschowar' of within or withoute tak oute of ony mutoune
the neris of or the nerecres' / fra the feest of pasch' to mychelmes' vndir
payne of eschete of the mutoune / to the balyhes et cetera

Item that na fleschowar' /sell flesche na brek fr flesch in ony othir' place
bot the fleschous vndir the payne of viij s' vnforgivin alsoft as thai
be taynte and eschete of the flesch'

Item that the fleschowaris dicht and mak clene the fleschous ilke ouke on
friday / and at thai Remove away the huchez that arr' in to the fleschous
vndir the sammyn payne /.

Decimo septimo die mensis Junij Anno supra dicto per commune consilium concessaum fuit
Domino Johanni de Kyndeloch' capellano illa capellania capelle beati nu Niniani
confessoris cituate in ecclesia fratrum carmelitarum ville de brugis in flandria
et naulum vnius sarpellarij de qualibet naue nauiganti de isto burgo versus
flandriam et zelandiam / Et qua naulum predictam vnius sarpellarij ab antiquo
concessum fuit reperacioni et edificacioni ecclesie beatj nicholai huius burgi / idem consilium
concessit beato nicholaio et ecclesie predicte ij g' monete flandrie levandos de
quolibet sarpellario / de qualibet barella de hamburgh' vj mitez / de qualibet
parua barella iiij mytez / et de qualibet dacra coreorum iiij mitez in recompensacione
nauli sarpellarij supradicti

Quarto die mensis Septembris per commune consilium cons concessa domino Willelmo
Ettale capellano et procuratori pontis de pulgoveny ad reparacionem eiusdem / libertas
gilde huius burgi cuicumque honeste et sufficienti persone per eundem dominum Willelmum
adducende / libere sine solucione cuiuscumque pecunie preter illam summam quam soluet
ad solucionem reparacionem dicti pontis et cetera

Decimo octauo die mensis Septembris Anno suprascripto Commune consilium ad
instanciam et litteratoriam Requestam Rectoris et vniuersitatis Sanctiandree concessit
magistro Johanni Smalee capellano perpetuo altaris Sancte crucis cituati et
fundati in ecclesia parochiali beati nichalai huius burgi liberam licenciam suam
et benevolenciam ad standum et Remanendum in dicta vniuersitate dum tamen ydoneum
capellanum dicto altari substituat seruiturum / qui tunc ex consensu eorundem
substituit dominum Johannem gall capellanum presentem et acceptantem et cetera eidem
altari seruiturum

Quinto die mensis octobris Anno supradicto decretum fuit et ordinatum per
commune Consilium quod penes seruicia seu salaria illorum qui bona naufracta
de ly barge de mari lucrati fuerunt et cetera
In the first thai sal haue for ilke laste of barell' gude vj s'
Item for the poke mele like thar' eftir / And of pakis of lynt
right sua
Item of the hundreth' burdis vj s'
Item for ilke merchandis kist ij s'
Item for ilke pur' schipmannis kist xij d'
Thome gled Jhoneson thomas Wyllamson bwrgis

It is ordanit be thir personis vndirwrittyne that is to say patrik of badenach
Androu Alansone Williame of spangne and Jhone henrison' Arbituris chosin
betwix Dauy Symsone and Williame heworth Inglisman Apon' the debat
of thre barrell' of Salmonde In maner and fourme as Eftir folouis that
gif Thomas turnkow will swer' that thre barrell' of hamburgh' of Salmonde
the quhilk the said Williame said was away out of his schip war Dauy
Symsonis and na nothiris the said Williame sal be qwyt And gif the saide
Thomas will nocht swer' the said Williame sal be dettur' to the forsaid Dauy
and fynde him souerte for the payment

Jonet Johnis dochter a bakar' of cakis and spillar of the mercat
Anny liel a spillar' of the mercat and wat nocht quhar on scho lyffis transeat de villa
Stevyne Jonsonis land vnlachfull
Anny louthane transeat de uilla
Jonet of strathachyne a cak baxtar and a spillar of the mercat
ThomeThere is a faint manicula in the left margin. Walkeris wyf a commovn rebellour' and a cak baxtar and spillar of the merkat
Cristiane of Kennardy transeat de uilla
meg firsale a resettour' of a falt
Nicol club sal falow the procession in his lynyng clais iij dayis and sit on his
kneis and ask his fadir and his middir forgiffyne

The xv day of the moneth of march Dauy symsone brocht certificacione in a letter
of Robert grayis that Thomas turncow swor that he wist na barrel beande
away bot ane the quhilk Williame baxtar' sald in orwele merkit with the said
Williammys awn merk And thane Williame heworth Inglisman chargit the said
Dauy to swer' that he laid the formennit salmonde in the said Thome turncowis
schip the forsaid Williame heworth suld content the said Dauy of the Sovme
of x lib' and xxvij d' of Scotis monee And in presens of the aldirman the forsaid
Dauy swor' And swa remanys the forsaid Williame heworth dettur' of the
said Sovme

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio huius burgi per Johannem vaus
Prepositum ix die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo
quarto

Quo die Subscripti de consensu tocius gilde electus electi fuerunt in communes
Consiliarios huius burgi et Jurati fuerunt vt moris est et cetera
a Alexander de camera
Johannes de fife
Gilbertus meignes
Ricardus Ruthirfurd'
Willelmus scherar'
Andreas culane
Simon blabre
Johannes gray
Johannes de Scrogs pater
a Johannes voket pater
Johannes de marr' Junior
a Matheus fichet
Alexander of Kintor
Andreas ayncroft
Thomas craufurd
patricius badenach'

Liniatores electi et Jurati
Johannes de fife
Johannes henrison'
Johannes voket pater
a Johannes gray
Johannes traile
Alexander de Kintor
Sthephanus Johnson'
Patrik de badenach'
Gilbertus meignes
Johannes de scrogs pater
a Johannes de marr' Junior
a Johannes henrison' culane
Andreas ayncroft
Willelmus scherar'
Simon blabre

Per commune consilium Thomas blyndseil electus fuit pro isto anno Receptor et
depositarius bonorum Comunium huius burgi

Item Johannes de fife erit prout fuit magister fabrice ecclesie et Recipiet omnes
denarios pertinentes ad eandem

The sammyn day henric Raise maistir of the barge that brak noght lang syne
beside this havin and J his merchandez Jeorge logane and John' cutbertson'
comperit in the tolbuth' of this burgh' before the aldirman and the counsaile
In presence of the Erle of craufurd / and thar' the aldirman in name of the
ton' askit and sperit at the said merchandis and merchan maistir give thai
warr' oght playntouse of ony nichbor' or induellar' of this burgh' / of
ony of thair' gudez / tane or haldin fra thaim / perofferand that give
thar' be ony cause of playnt / it suld be weil reformyt and amendit
And the said maistir and merchandis said thai wyst of na cause of playnt
bot the gude men of the ton' had done Right weile to thaim of the
quhilk thai thankit hartli the gude men of the ton' / Requiryng thaim
that give of gude continuacion give thai may get witting of ony gude
that it be Restorit / and that the ha aldirman grantit thankfulli to
doo / And apon this the aldirman askit instrumentis diuers'

Item Clais mollenar' maistir of the brokin hulk / and John' Iviot and
merchandis of the said schip comperit / and the aldirman
perofferit thaim in like maner as is befor writtin / and thai ansuerit right'
swa / and than the aldirman askit of thaim instrumentis as is forsaid'

It is ordanit that Williame mathouson' for the suppres' done be him to John'
galt / sal begyne to morne that is to say the xv day of the moneth' of
october the yher' forsaid / and the said he sal vphald the ladymess'
with' note on twisday thurisdai and fridai ilke owke for a yher'
And quhilk of thaim twa that trespass' first til othir' in tyme tocum
and distrublis' othir' for this cause in tyme tocum / sal pai to the
kirk werk x lib' vnforgiffin / borgh' for William mathouson' John' of
Scrogs the son' / and for John' galt John' of Scrogs the fadre

Vicesimo die mensis octobris Anno supradicto Thomas de camera dedit Robertum
Wormot plegium J legalem quod Jacobus yhim magister de ly Craar' et omnes
alij aduene et alienegene erunt indempnes et inperturbatj pro eo et omnibus
adherentibus sibi / durante tempore officij sui et cetera Et satisfaciet dicto Jacobo
pecunias Receptas ab eodem et cetera

Eodem die ordinatum fuit quod omnes prepositj et balliui qui non Reddiderunt compota
sua de annis elapsis Reddant sua compota et soluant arreg arreragia eorundam
compotorum infra tempus limitatum in statutis scriptis sub communi sigillo sub penis
contentis in eisdem .

Item prepositus et balliui optulerunt confratribus gilde ad eligandum si placeat certos
alios Receptores et depositores bonorum communium huius burgi et cetera

Item consensum est et statutum per maiorem parte gilde huius burgi / quod commune
consilium determinabit omnes querelas et debatas ortas et oriendas inter confratres
gilde per so sedulas et querelas absque exstensione aliqua pre plegiorum et cetera
et tales determinaciones fient per pum prepositum et sex personas alias de J communi
consilio quos ad hoc inuenerit pro tempore prompciores et cetera Et sedebunt
ad audiendum et determinandum huiusmodi querelas omni ebdomida die martis
et die Jouis et cetera

xxvjto die mensis supradicti anno quo supra / Ricardus Jakson' asseruit et dixit quod
alias sigillum suum est ab eo ipso nescienti ablatum sive furatum prout et alias fuit
quare protestatus fuit quod si que littere et euidencie fuerint cum dicto sigillo
sigillate sibi aut heredibus suis nullum preiudicium generarent preter illas
euidencias quas ipse confessus fuit se fecisse
Item

Item eodem die patricius de badenach' nomine et ex parte domini episcopi aberdon brechinensis
presentauit quamdam litteram obligatoriam prefati Ricardi de x lib' factis magistro Dauid
crannoch' fratri germano eiusdem domini Episcopi / in qua eciam littera continebatur et idem
Ricardus obligatur prefato magistro Dauid / quod non alienabit aut vendet terram
suam cuicumque preter sibi donec fuerit sibi de dictis x libris plenarie f satisfactum
quare prefatus patricius nomine quo supra protestatus fuit quod alienaciones quecumque per
dictum Ricardum facte vel faciende prefato magistro Dauid nullum preiudicium generaret

Item eodem die comparens in pretorio Thomas de marr' et e Helena sponsa sua
asseruerunt publice quod ipsium vnanimi consensu concesserunt ad feodofirmam Johanni
littistar' quamdam terram suam Jacentem infra istud burgum in vico furcarum ex parte
occidentali p eiusdem inter terram Willelmum sprunt ex parte australi ex vna / et terram
eorundem thome et helene ex parte boreali ex parte partibus ex altera / quam quidem
terram cum pertinenciis in manibus Johannis Kymedi vnius balliuorum huius burgi resignarunt
ad dandum saisinam prefato Johanni secundum tenorem carte sue / Et quia predicta helena
erat coniunctim infeodata predicta terra / ipsa helena certa et certificata de
Jure suo Jurauit ad sacra dei ewangelia quod dicta assedacio facta fuit de
ipsius consensu expresso / et quod nuncquam de cetero illam quacumque de causa reuocabit
aut contradicet / Super quibus dictus Johannes a me notario publico pecijt
instrumentum / Testibus Johanne vaus tunc preposito Johanne de fife gilberto
meignes et cetera

The xxix dai of the moneth forsaid the hale commoune consale and mony of
the gilde / it was ordanit and statute / that gilbert meignes Alexander of Kintor
John' gray and Duncane of clat or ony twa of thaim sal haue ful poware
to by to the commoune profite of this al maner of gudez of aventur' / that
cummys be see to this burgh' / and til dispone thaim to the nyghborez' of
the ton' as afferis / And nane othiris of this burgh' sal by ony sik gudez
quhil the forsaid men haue dischargit thaim of the bying of thaim
vndir the payne of the tynsale of the profite of that gudez / and xl s'
vnforgiffin to the commoune profite to be Rasit / and he sal sit in the
tolbuth' for acht daijs

Item it ordanit that the baxstaris sal sel na brede bot in the bothes'
vndir the tolbuth' / and thar' sal be na brede sald in ony othir' placez of
the ton' / fra martymes' furth'

Memorandum quod vjto die mensis nouembris Anno Domini et cetera supradicto
Comperit matheus crukin maistir of schip laddin oute of pruce grauntit Strailesounde
and grauntit befor the aldirman and the hale consaile that he had sald
to the toune al the t Ry that is in his schip / that is to say ilke soundis
last for vij lib' x s' / and al his burdis ilke hundreth' for v lib' x s'

Item the counsaile has grantit to the man that the aldirman sal assigne to
deliuer the Ry and gaddre the siluer of it for his seruice of ilke barell'
j d' and of ilke hundreth' burdis vj d'

Memorandum that on the xvijo day of nouembir' the yer' of our' lord
jM iiijcccc and xliiij thar comperit John' gray burgess' of Abirden'
in to the tolbuth of that ilke and wpgeff in to the handis of
John' the wauss' than Aldirman and to Duncan of clat ballye of the
said burch ane annuall' rent of xl d' yerly til sant John'
the baptistis awtar' of a land lyand in the buth raw
on the west sid of the galow gat betwen' the land of Simon
blabir' of the suth sid And a bwth of that the ayris of Dawy
trall is haldis of that ilke land on the north half the said
awtar' haffand the fe of the said xl d' the said John' gray
remaynand with the said John' gray franktennement for all' the dayis of
his lyffe

head.add: Memorandum quod Willelmus de meldrum contulit istos xiij s' iiij d' in perpetuam elimosinam altari beatorum laurencij et et Ninianij cituate in ecclesia parochiali huius burgi

div.head: Copia
div.p:
Vniuersis hanc carta visuris vel audituris laurencius filius Dauid burgensis de abirdene
eternam in domino salutem / Nouerit vniuersitas vestra me dedisse vendidisse necnon omnino et
imperpetuum a me quitum clamasse et hac presentj carta mea confirmasse Alexandro filio
Willelmij Willelmj heredi meo apparenti totum illud croftum quod de mero conquestu procuraui
cum omnes Jure et clameo quae in dicto crofto habeo habui vel habere potero in futurum
quoquomodo / quod Jacet infra burgum de Abirdene in vico de foty inter terram
Ade filij Willelmi versus boream ex parte vna et terram Andree stirk versus austrum
ex altera / pro quadam summa pecunie quam predictus Alexander tempore confectionis presentis
carte pro toto Jure meo et clameo in sicca pecunia numerata bene et fideliter michi
pre manibus persoluit / vnde pro me bene teneo contentum et me pacatum / Tenendum et
habendum predicto Alexandro heredibus suis et suis assignatis pure et imperpetuum / a me
libere quiete plenarie honorifice bene et in pace / Reddendo inde annuatim de dicto
crofto predictus Alexander heredes sui et sui assignatj Willelmo de meldrum et heredibus
suis Racione feodofirme tresdecim solidos et quator denarios sterlingorum / ad
terminos infra burgum vsuales videlicet ad festa penthecostos et sancti martinj in
yeme per equales porciones pro omni alio seruicio seculari inde facienda exactione
seu demanda qualicumque / Ego vero predictus laurencius predictum croftum cum omnibus
pertinenciis libertatibus et aisiamentis in debita longitudine et latitudine predicto alexandro
heredibus suis et suis assignatis pro predicta pecunie summa vt premittitur michi
soluta et in meam vtilitatem conuersa / et pro predictis annuis firmis vt prescripti
est an annuatim persoluendis contra omnes homines et feminas Warantizabo et
imperpetuum defendam In cuius Rei testimonium Sig presentj carte Sigillum meum
est appensum / necnon et Sigilla alexandri de nesbit Johannis brow Roberti
bullok et Johannis fichet tunc balliuorum burgi de abirdene gracia testimonij
apponj procuraui / Datum apud abirdene vicesimo die mensis nouembris Anno
Domini millesimo tricentesimo sexagesimo primo / Hijs testibus thoma merser tunc
aldirmanno de aberdene macolmo Wright Willelmo de leith Johanne crab
Willelmo de paris' Waltero de ettale et multis alijs

Super istam cartam Johannes vaus prepositus dicti burgi pecijt instrumentum quarto die
mensis nouembris Anno Domini M CCCC xljjjj Indictione octaua pontificatus
sanctissimj domini nostri Eugenij pape quartj Anno xiiij / presentibus Johanne de
scrogs patre Simone blabre thoma blyndseil et Johanne de scrogs filio cum
alijs
